os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Windows 7

name: MDAPI_Plus MDAPIPlus MDAPI+ Plus
short_description:
MDAPI_Plus is a DirectShow filter, which can descramble television 
broadcasting in the DVB transport stream. It can handle satellite 
(DVB-S), terrestrial (DVB-T), cable (DVB-C) and any other variant of 
DVB. This filter implements all the functionality of Agarwal's 
DirectShow MDAPI filter 
(http://sourceforge.net/projects/mdapifilter/), so MDAPI_Plus can 
completely replace Agarwal's filter.
The filter use special DLLs (ffdecsa) to descramble TV channels. These 
DLLs included in the installation package. In addition, one or more 
plugins that conform to MDAPI standard is required, in order to 
descramble TV channels.
CAUTION, usage of descrambling DLL (ffdecsa) may be illegal in some 
countries. Descrambling of TV channels without official subscriptions 
is illegal in all countries. Developer is not responsible for any 
illegal usage of this software.
summary: MDAPI_Plus is a DirectShow filter, which can descramble television
